$ od -tx1 -Ax ../para.gif | sed -ne '13,17p'
0000c0 42 6b 6d 6b 84 82 84 63 65 63 94 96 9c 5a 59 5a
0000d0 18 1c 18 7b 7d 7b 73 75 73 4a 4d 4a ff ff ff 00
0000e0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
*
000180 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 21 f9 04

$ od -tx1 -Ax -v ../para.gif | sed -ne '13,17p'
0000c0 42 6b 6d 6b 84 82 84 63 65 63 94 96 9c 5a 59 5a
0000d0 18 1c 18 7b 7d 7b 73 75 73 4a 4d 4a ff ff ff 00
0000e0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
0000f0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
000100 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
